page.title: 20WILLERBY CENTRE SURVEY
page.content: Traffic. The other major complaint was about the volume of traffic in Willerby Square.Here three main roads meet: the one from Hull, the one to Hessle and the Humber Bridge and the road to Beverly which passes the Gutter Lane industrial estate.In particular the siting of the zebra crossings just of the main roundabout was thought to be very dangerous. Population movement. Everyone we spoke to seemed to be happy with the housing and the general state of the area.Only one of the people interviewed had lived in the area less than 5 years, half had lived in Willerby over 10 years.The majority said the area combined easy access to the countryside and the town.
